channel.description: Welcome to winstonbrown.me. I'm Winston Brown, a self-taught software engineer, sharing my journey through coding, personal projects, and new technologies. item.title: Creating Functions in PostgreSQL
item.description: Learn how to create a simple function in PostgreSQL to average numbers from a table.
